TopicTitle: Been lurking awhile, time to say hello!

Articles.Content:
I have never had this much fun with an indie game before, so a big thanks to the wonderful devs!

One of the best parts of KSP is hands down the community, such a friendly and helpful bunch, not to mention full of amazing add-on developers. I hope that I can eventually give back as much as you\'ve given me.
Yes, the amount and quality of the mods for an indie game like this is amazing ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Enjoy.

Welcome to the Forums! I\'m sure you\'ll find us to be quite the lively bunch.

Yes, KSP is blessed by its community which continues to provide amazing results in the fields modding and support.

Have Fun!

- Your Friendly Neighborhood Moderator,

Radion Spaceworks
Kerbal space program is an indi? It has like droves of devs on it..... I thought to be an indi you had to be INDIvidual?!?

I always thought in was **inde**pendent.

Could be wrong.

Hi by the way! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

An 'indie' developer is one that is developing without a publisher, they are taking on the project independently. There aren\'t 'droves' of developers on this. There might be a dozen people working on this project, primarily developers and a few non-programmer types

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

> 
> An 'indie' developer is one that is developing without a publisher, they are taking on the project independently. There aren\'t 'droves' of developers on this. There might be a dozen people working on this project, primarily developers and a few non-programmer types

But if this was supost to be individual, then there is way more then one on it lol

Oh, I get it now.

> 
> But if this was supost to be individual, then there is way more then one on it lol
> 
> Oh, I get it now.

Well your signature is certainly appropriate haha ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
